head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DE JONG, BASTIAAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DE JONG, BASTIAAN

block.p: De JONG-Bastiaan. On Sept. 3, 2000 in Chatham, MA. Beloved husband of Jean. Devoted father of Alison, Jennifer, Martha and Elizabeth. Dear brother of Elizabeth van der Boon of The Netherlands. Memorial Service Thursday, September 14th at St. Christopher's Episcopal Church, Chatham, MA. at 1:30 P.M. Contributions in his memory to Hospice of Cape Cod, 923 Route 6A, Yarmouthport, MA. 02675.
